SELECT bn.BANNER_ID ,bn.SITE_ID ,bn.BANNER_SE_CODE ,cd.CODE_NM AS BANNER_SE_CODE_NM ,bn.SORT_NO ,bn.BANNER_NM ,bn.BANNER_PATH ,bn.BANNER_M_PATH ,bn.BANNER_LINK ,bn.BANNER_WINDOW_AT ,bn.BANNER_BGNDE ,bn.BANNER_ENDDE ,bn.BANNER_TY_CODE ,bn.BANNER_LBL ,bn.BANNER_LBL_CLOR ,bn.DFK ,bn.GOODS_ID ,bn.EVT_TXT ,bn.BCRN_CLOR ,bn.FONT_CLOR ,bn.ACTVTY_AT ,bn.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,bn.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,bn.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,bn.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,bn.USE_AT ,p.PRTNR_ID ,p.PRTNR_NM FROM DTN_BANNER bn LEFT OUTER JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cd ON cd.CODE = bn.BANNER_SE_CODE AND cd.CODE_ID = 'CMS004' AND cd.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_PRTNR p ON p.PRTNR_ID = bn.PRTNR_ID
ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC, BANNER_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM DTN_BANNER bn LEFT OUTER JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cd ON cd.CODE = bn.BANNER_SE_CODE AND cd.CODE_ID = 'CMS004' AND cd.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_PRTNR p ON p.PRTNR_ID = bn.PRTNR_ID

SELECT bn.BANNER_ID ,bn.SITE_ID ,bn.BANNER_SE_CODE ,bn.SORT_NO ,bn.PRTNR_ID ,bn.BANNER_NM ,bn.BANNER_PATH ,bn.BANNER_M_PATH ,bn.BANNER_LINK ,bn.BANNER_WINDOW_AT ,bn.BANNER_BGNDE ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(BANNER_BGNDE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%Y-%m-%d') BANNER_BGN_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(BANNER_BGNDE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%H') BANNER_BGN_HOUR ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(BANNER_BGNDE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%i') BANNER_BGN_MIN ,bn.BANNER_ENDDE ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(BANNER_ENDDE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%Y-%m-%d') BANNER_END_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(BANNER_ENDDE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%H') BANNER_END_HOUR ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(BANNER_ENDDE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%i') BANNER_END_MIN ,bn.BANNER_TY_CODE ,bn.BANNER_LBL ,bn.BANNER_LBL_CLOR ,bn.ACTVTY_AT ,bn.DFK ,bn.GOODS_ID ,bn.EVT_TXT ,bn.BCRN_CLOR ,bn.FONT_CLOR ,bn.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,bn.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,bn.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,bn.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,bn.USE_AT ,gs.GOODS_NM FROM DTN_BANNER bn LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_GOODS gs ON bn.GOODS_ID = gs.GOODS_ID WHERE BANNER_ID = #{bannerId}

SELECT bn.BANNER_ID ,bn.SITE_ID ,bn.BANNER_SE_CODE ,cd.CODE_NM AS BANNER_SE_CODE_NM ,bn.SORT_NO ,bn.BANNER_NM ,bn.BANNER_PATH ,bn.BANNER_M_PATH ,bn.BANNER_LINK ,bn.BANNER_WINDOW_AT ,bn.BANNER_BGNDE ,bn.BANNER_ENDDE ,bn.BANNER_TY_CODE ,bn.BANNER_LBL ,bn.BANNER_LBL_CLOR ,bn.DFK ,bn.GOODS_ID ,bn.EVT_TXT ,bn.BCRN_CLOR ,bn.FONT_CLOR ,bn.ACTVTY_AT ,bn.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,bn.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,bn.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,bn.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,bn.USE_AT ,gs.GOODS_NM ,gs.GOODS_KND_CODE ,gs.EVNT_WORDS ,gs.GOODS_PC ,gs.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE ,gs.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE ,gs.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE ,gi.GOODS_LRGE_IMAGE_PATH ,gi.GOODS_MIDDL_IMAGE_PATH ,gi.GOODS_SMALL_IMAGE_PATH ,gs.GOODS_INTRCN ,gs.MRKT_PC ,gs.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD ,gs.SBSCRPT_MIN_USE_WEEK ,gs.SBSCRPT_MIN_USE_MT ,gs.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY ,gs.SBSCRPT_SETLE_DAY ,ptr.PRTNR_ID ,ptr.PRTNR_NM ,b.BRAND_NM ,c.CMPNY_NM FROM DTN_BANNER bn LEFT OUTER JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cd ON cd.CODE = bn.BANNER_SE_CODE AND cd.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_GOODS gs ON bn.GOODS_ID = gs.GOODS_ID LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_IMAGE gi ON gi.GOODS_ID = gs.GOODS_ID AND gi.GOODS_IMAGE_SE_CODE = 'GNR' AND gi.GOODS_IMAGE_SN = (SELECT MIN(GOODS_IMAGE_SN) FROM STN_GOODS_IMAGE WHERE GOODS_ID = gs.GOODS_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG pcm ON pcm.PCMAPNG_ID = gs.PCMAPNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_PRTNR ptr ON bn.PRTNR_ID = ptr.PRTNR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_GOODS_BRAND b ON b.BRAND_ID = gs.BRAND_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = pcm.CMPNY_ID
AND bn.ACTVTY_AT = 'Y'
AND ptr.PRTNR_ID = #{prtnrId}
AND INSTR(bn.DFK, CASE WEEKDAY(NOW()) WHEN '0' THEN '월' WHEN '1' THEN '화' WHEN '2' THEN '수' WHEN '3' THEN '목' WHEN '4' THEN '금' WHEN '5' THEN '토' WHEN '6' THEN '일' END) AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i') BETWEEN bn.BANNER_BGNDE AND bn.BANNER_ENDDE ORDER BY bn.SORT_NO ASC, bn.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM DESC LIMIT 100
